answers.answer: They are checking for bacteria, protein in your urine and I'm not sure what else
Oh Ok so for like infections and stuff
Yeah bacteria, protein, sugar, infections, my doctor checks for drugs all that stuff lol
Lol yeah I was supposed when I found out they were checking for drugs lol
Well I don't do drugs so it's ok they can check for that all they want lol

Mine I my check for protein and sugar because urine isn't always a good way to look for bacteria they normally do a swab for bacteria. But they mainly look for protein and sugar in your urine for signs of pre eclampsia

Oh ok yea I've been so scare of preeclampsia since I've had swollen feet since 16 weeks now I'm about to be 24 weeks and it way worst now and I make sure I tell them every time about my swollen feet and have them look at them but they say everything is fine with me so Idk why I got swollen feet so early in pregnancy
They don't always have too I refused to get checked before cause I was pissed off at them so I guess they didn't want me to blow up on them anymore then I did lol
U refused for them to check your pee ? Why lol
They do not check for drugs maybe next time ask them thats what i did

Lol yes I told them I'm not peeing for them to just check the heartbeat and stuff because I don't want or need to pee and I'm not waiting to pee because my appointment was at like 12:30 I got there 12:10 they said oh they cancelled my appointment but didn't set another date dnt know who did it why or anything and I'm telling them Idc about all that I have my appointment paper nobody called me and told me I came all the way down there mind you on a bus so they were goin to look into it instead they went to lunch was just chilling and almost two hours later they said I can be seen I was about to switch doctors and everything that day and I refused it cause they already wasted my time I just wanted to see if my baby is ok the doctor apologized and said they should've never did that and not let her know until now cause she doesn't refuse pregnant patients especially if I have proof of my appointment smh

Actually yes they do check for drugs here in NJ. If you ask them to print out your history you will see it there in your paper work. Also I'm an RN so I do know these things. Maybe in your state they don't but in mines they do lol

Well i dont live in nj and didn't know u were but here in new york and where i go they do not so not all places do that im 29 weeks and i have not one time gottwn checked for drugs but i dont do any anyways lol they check pee for othwr things periodically
Mines? Lol yea every where is different i have a wonderful doctor i doubt anyone who sees her are on drugs they cant afford her
I'm in Georgia but I didn't wand to ask my doctor straight up are u testing me for drugs ? Lol I don't want her to think I'm on them lol
New York also checks for drugs hewn you pee. Also most people are on medicaid or use there job insurance so they can afford any obgyn that's in there network.
Ima just ask her why they always make me pee in a cup lol
Lol yeah just ask.  Cause I never asked but Snice I'm 36 week's they gave me a print out of paper work in case I go into labor and it has all these drug names and it said negative for all.
Ok do I have to ask for that print out or they'll just give it to me ? Ima barely be 24 weeks on Saturday
You can ask them to print out your medical records.  But than they gonna have to give it to you again once your 35 weeks. When there is more information on it

question: every time I go to the doctor they take my pee why is that ?
